data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Admiraal Jan Evertsen cruise from Nieuwediep to Batavia started at 1846-06-04
Ship: Admiraal Jan Evertsen, Voyage: Nieuwediep - Batavia, 1st Observer: C.P. Kuiper (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
